title: Bug 32006Save dialog doesn't remove '&' from title string
description: I tried to add JavaDoc documentation to a JAR in the buildpath of a project,and was prompted with a dialog box to select the JavaDoc location.The title of the dialog box was " &Select JavaDoc Location:"I'm not sure if the & is an artifact of being on a Mac OS X or whether it'sa glitch for other OSs as well.
